comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content:
I don't know why you have ID'd this as "Lane Cove Road, Turramurra".

"Fairyland"   was way down the river from Turramurra.   It was located on the Ryde side of the river between where the Crematorium is   and where Epping Road crosses the river.     I remember going there in the late 1960's    and they had some very antique amusement machines.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: Across the river in the background of this photo,  is the spot where Dr Bogle and Mrs Chandler were found.

comment.author: 91311000@N07
comment._content: It's Delhi Rd, mich, not Epping. And, yes, that's south of Fuller's Bridge and the area oposite is the bank where Bogle and Chandler were found. A couple of hundred metres further is the 8th hole at Chatswood golf course
